content.html: 👩‍🚀🔫👩‍🚀 A big mistake made by many, including past me, is to not have an owner who runs it like Production. A bigger mistake is everybody owning it. The worst mistake is throwing a collection of CI tools over the wall to another team with a note attached saying “Your problem now”
